mapper.select: SELECT no, userNo, type, pNo, photo, name, rating, addr, cName FROM(SELECT b.no no, b.user_no userNo, b.type type, p.no pNo, p.photo photo, p.name name, p.rating rating, p.addr addr, c.name cName, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, user_no, content, type FROM bookmarks WHERE user_no=#{no} AND type='P') b, places p, (SELECT a.no no,DECODE(b.name,'생활 / 편의','편의시설 > 생활 / 편의','','','엔터테인먼트','편의시설 > 엔터테인먼트','음식점','음식점','편의시설','편의시설')||' > ' ||a.name name FROM p_category a, p_category b WHERE a.parent_no = b.no(+) ORDER BY 1) c WHERE b.content = p.no AND p.category = c.no AND p.name like #{name}) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT userNo, content, type, tNo, tCategory, location, title, regdate, hit, pic, lvl, profile, nick, honey, venom FROM(SELECT b.user_no userNo, b.content content, b.type type, t.no tNo, t.category tCategory, t.location location, t.title title, t.regdate regdate, t.hit hit, t.pic pic, u.lvl lvl, u.profile profile, u.nick nick, h.honey honey, v.venom venom, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, user_no, content, type FROM bookmarks WHERE user_no=#{no} AND type='T') b, tips t, users u, (SELECT content, count(*) honey FROM recommandation WHERE type='T' AND likes='G' GROUP BY content) h, (SELECT content, count(*) venom FROM recommandation WHERE type='T' AND likes='D' GROUP BY content) v WHERE b.content = t.no AND t.user_no = u.no AND h.content(+) = t.no AND v.content(+) = t.no AND t.title like '%%') WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM bookmarks WHERE user_no=#{userNo} AND type='T'

SELECT b.user_no userNo, b.content content, b.type type, u.no uNo, u.profile profile, u.lvl lvl, u.nick nick FROM(SELECT no, user_no, content, type FROM bookmarks WHERE user_no=#{userNo} AND type='U') b, users u WHERE b.content = u.no
